news.title: How a 'nudify' site turned a group of friends into key figures in a fight against AI-generated porn
news.summary: A group of friends in Minnesota last year learned that a man they knew had used their social media photos to create pornographic deepfakes. The man used the photos to make a pornographic image of himself.

news.title: Here's what to know about a federal government shutdown
news.summary: The government previously shut down during President Donald Trump's first term over disputes about funding his planned U.S.-Mexico border wall. The government also shut down over disputes over funding during President Barack Obama's second term.

news.title: Trump calls for the firing of Lisa Monaco, Microsoft president of global affairs
news.summary: Maria Bartiromo brought up Monaco's position at Microsoft during her show. Monaco was appointed to the position in July. The appointment was announced by Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella.

news.title: 'Seconds count': Avoiding airplane collisions at airports could come down to cockpit alerts
news.summary: Honeywell is developing a series of new cockpit alerts aimed at preventing collisions at or around airports. Honeywell: New cockpit alerts are aimed at prevent collisions at airports.

news.title: Markets won't care if Trump fires Fed Governor Cook, DOJ tells Supreme Court
news.summary: Gov. Lisa Cook has urged the Supreme Court not to let President Donald Trump's attempt to fire her take effect while her lawsuit against him plays out.

news.title: I inherited $600K in Apple stock. It now makes up 50% of my portfolio. Is that too risky?
news.summary: “I worry that a downturn in the tech sector, or something Apple-specific, could wipe out half my portfolio,” he says.

news.title: Recession seems far off — that’s the good news. Yet the economy is also far from trouble-free.
news.summary: The U.S. Federal Reserve cut interest rates last week. The news isn't all that bad, according to the central bank. The economy is still in good shape, however.

news.title: Want to invest in gold? Here’s how to plan for — or even avoid — the potential tax headaches
news.summary: Gold isn’t taxed the same way as other investments. Gold is not subject to the same tax rates as other types of investments.

news.title: The AI trade increasingly hinges on OpenAI — and that’s a big risk for the entire market
news.summary: Wall Street pro's advice as AI spurs a wave of debt offerings and consumer backlash. “Be careful.” that’s one Wall Street pro’S advice.

news.title: I’m retiring at 63 with $1.5 million saved. Is 70/30 equities/bonds too risky?
news.summary: “My spouse and I have a combined $5,500 in monthly Social Security payments and a $2,900-a-month pension.”
